text: Liu Lingling (born 8 November 1994) is a female Chinese trampoline gymnast. She is the 2014 World Trampoline champion. In 2015 she won the gold medal in the women's team event at the 2015 Trampoline World Championships held in Odense, Denmark. In 2017 she won, alongside Zhong Xingping and Zhu Xueying, the gold medal in the women's team event at 2017 Trampoline Gymnastics World Championships. In 2018 she won the gold medal in the women's individual event at the 2018 Asian Games held in Jakarta, Indonesia. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:Sportspeople from Fuzhou Category:Chinese female trampolinists Category:Gymnasts at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for China Category:Asian Games medalists in gymnastics Category:Medalists at the Trampoline Gymnastics World Championships
title: Liu Lingling
